Author: fishervwb
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: Era of smart airports ensures growth of airport sleeping pods market The global airport sleeping pods market was valued at 55 million USD in 2016 and is expected to surpass 75 million USD by 2021 based on 4 major players in this field in 2017, says analysis made by Technavio. Therefore there is a natural potential for growth in this fledgling market.   According to Avimanyu Basu, a lead analyst for aerospace research at Technavio, the future for the sleeping pod market is healthy: ‚ÄúEmergence of smart airport concepts will drive the demand in the airport sleeping pods market. Seeing the growing deployment of the internet of everything enabled intelligent airport infrastructure along with the increasing investments in technological advancements, International Air Transport Association and Airports Council International jointly proposed the concept of smart airports.‚Äù  Concerns regarding profitability and passenger numbers have driven airport operators to examine ways to distinguish themselves from the competition. Smart airports, which are a natural home for sleeping pods, have proven successful in cutting costs, improving efficiency and demonstrating a commitment to passenger care. Under the smart airport approach, all systems are integrated into one single digital grid, which helps real-time information sharing and deep cross-silo collaboration. https://medium.com/airpod-blog/era-of-smart-airports-ensures-growth-of-airport-sleeping-pods-market-4713dbb9be5b

AirPod is so much more, offering users the ability to have a confined, secure, and relaxing area where they can do work, take calls, watch movies, play games, or sleep. The aim is to offer relaxation, regeneration, and rest to those who are passing through transit hubs across the globe.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: It was already answered a few answers above but we can do it again:  1. You are able to pay rent for using AirPod unit.  2. You can become a ‚Äúsponsor‚Äù of an AirPod unit only with APOD token. In Sponsorship Program, ICO contributors to exchange APOD tokens for the right to participate and earn up to 80% profits generated by AirPod unit every single month. ICO contributors will have the value of their tokens doubled when entering Sponsorship Program meaning they will be able to become a Sponsor of twice as much of the AirPod as if APOD tokens would be bought after the ICO. Example: If the AirPod price is set at $32.k ICO contributor will pay $16.k in APOD tokens gained in ICO.  3. You get a possibility to become an AirPod‚Äôs Partner. With our ‚ÄúPartnership Program‚Äù we are establishing a global network of AirPods that will enable everyone to become part of an Uber-like, but much more profitable Business model. In this last stage of our project development, you will be able to propose any place in your domain as a new potential AirPod location. If the location is suitable we‚Äôll support the engagement 100% by sending AirPod directly to the proposed location. The Partnership Program will enable you to earn a passive income in APODs with peace of mind.  4. APOD token is not conditioned by unstable crypto market. For a cryptocurrency to be successful over time it must be driven by a sustainable economy. As customers use the AirPod and distribution grows, the ecosystems network effect will grow, building its value, and bringing lasting rewards for participants in the sponsorship program and token holders. AirPod‚Äôs future and your profits are influenced by the AirPod Business performance and not by Crypto Market.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: One of most commonly asked although it is answered on our website in FAQs.  We‚Äôll take care of cleaning and smells by implementing the following technology:  ‚Ä¢ LED lights for disinfection that turns on after each user (detailed information - link is on the website).  ‚Ä¢ We have integrated scent machine into Air condition which refines and perfumes the air with the procedure of cold micro-molecular dispersion. Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: APOD holders have 4 major benefits:  1. You are able to pay rent for using AirPod unit.  2. You can become a ‚Äúsponsor‚Äù of an AirPod unit. In Sponsorship Program, ICO contributors to exchange APOD tokens for the right to participate and earn up to 80% profits generated by AirPod unit every single month. ICO contributors will have the value of their tokens doubled when entering Sponsorship Program meaning they will be able to become a Sponsor of twice as much of the AirPod as if APOD tokens would be bought after the ICO. Example: If the AirPod price is set at $32.k ICO contributor will pay $16.k in APOD tokens gained in ICO.  3. You get a possibility to become an AirPod‚Äôs Partner. With our ‚ÄúPartnership Program‚Äù we are establishing a global network of AirPods that will enable everyone to become part of an Uber-like, but much more profitable Business model. In this last stage of our project development, you will be able to propose any place in your domain as a new potential AirPod location. If the location is suitable we‚Äôll support the engagement 100% by sending AirPod directly to the proposed location. The Partnership Program will enable you to earn a passive income in APODs with peace of mind.  4. APOD token is not conditioned by unstable crypto market. For a cryptocurrency to be successful over time it must be driven by a sustainable economy. As customers use the AirPod and distribution grows, the ecosystems network effect will grow, building its value, and bringing lasting rewards for participants in the sponsorship program and token holders. AirPod‚Äôs future and your profits are influenced by the AirPod Business performance and not by Crypto Market.

Author: Get_Rich
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: Five guiding Lean principles will be followed rigorously: - Specify Value: Know the important process points of the customer. - Identify and Eliminate potential Waste: Contracting it from the process. - Smooth Flow: Allow process of work to pass freely. - Pull Value: Control flow by allowing work to be pulled through the process. - Pursue Perfection: Make improvement a habit.

The main benefits for contributors are that they avoid the volatility of using cryptocurrencies, and no longer need to use exchanges to buy cryptocurrencies to contribute.  You read that right: EUR can be your paying currency in AirPod ICO.  For contributors, that are new to crypto world, contribution in cryptocurrencies can be challenging without proper guide. Funds can get lost, unknown world can be difficult to understand.  Due to our mission to make possibility to be part of our story equal for everybody, AirPod decided to enable direct fiat investment in our ICO.  If you are interested in our project, you can now contribute through fiat based payment gateways (with minimum 500 EUR).  Details for payment in EUR will be provided after approved KYC.  https://medium.com/airpod-blog/airpod-possibility-for-direct-fiat-contribution-84ef33f01eb5

It is a simple solution for people seeking relaxation, sleep, isolated working space or fun. AirPod is full of cutting edge technology that enables users to use free Wi-Fi, watching movies, listening to music, reading a book or having a much needed sleep / rest.

Even the existing "privacy pod" is unimpressive, to say the least, and not well equipped for those who want to sleep and / or work. AirPods, on the other hand, offers an enhanced, comfortable, and secure space, accommodating every individual - whether he wants to read a book, watch a movie, take a nap, or finish some work

Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: 1 hour rent rate will start from $18 (15‚Ç¨) / hour (depending on location) or with 10% discount if rented by APOD tokens.  We'll take care of cleaning and smells by implementing the following technology: ‚Ä¢ LED lights for disinfection that turns on after each user (detailed information). ‚Ä¢ We have integrated scent machine into Air condition which refines and perfumes the air with the procedure of cold micro-molecular dispersion. Author: filsid
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: The main prize of the AirPod Challenge goes to Valeriy!  AirPod‚Äôs Challenge had come to an end. AirPod team selected 4 best articles which were published at Reddit and put at vote.  You decided that Valeriy provided the best explanation for: ¬ªWhy the APOD is the top choice in both‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääbear and bull market¬´.  Valeriy‚Äôs explanation:  ‚ÄúEach fiat payment that AirPod receives is split into two: 50% goes towards covering company costs while the remaining 50% is allocated to buying tokens on the exchange. The platform buys these tokens at the lowest market price and puts them back into the exchange as sell orders, or sell walls, to the value of $2.  When more money comes into the ecosystem, more AirPod capsules will be manufactured and distributed, and the cycle will continue. When these tokens are placed back on the exchange at a higher price, it will subsequently increase the price and value of an APOD token.  This means APOD is not directly influenced by Crypto Market‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääwhich means even if the market drops, the value of APOD token will continue to grow.‚Äù https://medium.com/airpod-blog/the-main-prize-of-the-airpod-challenge-goes-to-valeriy-c40de1cc01dc

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: We do have some internal calculations ‚Äì predictions, but it is impossible to speculate about the price. What we can say is, that our token will have a real economic value, not just speculative like the most of ICO projects. The ultimate benefit for token holder is that they can enter into a profit-share relationship by converting APOD tokens to a ‚ÄúSponsorship Program‚Äù through DApp platform in the second phase of our project development. By that, we are enabling our contributors to be part of the most stable and high earning crypto businesses until this date. Further, in the 3rd stage, we are introducing ‚ÄúPartnership Program‚Äù that will enable everyone to become part of Uber-like, but much more profitable Business model ‚Äì people will be able to suggest any place in their domain as a potential AirPod placement area and start earning money with a peace of mind.

Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: It is hard to say there is strong competition in the field as Sleeping Pod market is still in its starting phase. Project will be market leader in at least 2 years time according to Roadmap.  How did AirPod answer to the challenge of today's early Sleeping Pod market: ‚Ä¢ Better overall functionality of the unit with more features compared to competition. ‚Ä¢ Luxury at affordable prices as well as cutting-edge technology. ‚Ä¢ No need for a pre-ready-made space for installing. ‚Ä¢ Fast-expanding Business model (due to distribution and Blockchain) with an aim to become market leader in two years.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: This was already answered a page ago but anyhow.  The shortest answer to your question is: there are 2 way you will profit out of your contribution: a) as token holder/owner. The potential increase of value is in execution of: as we split the received FIAT (payment for rent): using 50% for our company costs and the remaining 50% for buying Tokens on exchange at market price and placing sell orders (sell wall) at equivalent value of $2 in both ETH/APOD and BTC/APOD pairings. While the number of distributed AirPods and users will grow the frequency of Tokens we buy from the Exchange grows, as a result, the value of APOD token will automatically increase over time. This simply means that more AirPods are installed and more users are generated, the frequency of Token buyback from the exchange and placing them back at a higher price, will increase with the price of APOD Token. b) as ICO contributor you will be able to convert APOD tokens to a Sponsorship Program for each installed AirPod unit for an indefinite time period thus establishing a profit-sharing relationship (Reward), giving you the possibility to manage unit(s) and own the right to collect fees in APOD Tokens. This simply means you are eligable to collect profits from profit generated by AirPod unit(s). It is like owning mining machine but better/more profitable.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: It was also already answered a while ago but still (in connection with Blockchain):  We see the potential of BC use wider than typical ICO. Beside implementation of our token (which is also one of the ways to rent our Airpod), the BC will be used in the development or DApp platform. Primary use of the DApp platform is general management, economic overview, and control of the individual AirPod unit(s). At the same time it is enabling complete transparency, helping us control and grow our business. More about this is written in our WP on pages: 31,32, 36, 37, 38. In addition BC enables processes on DApp platform (below) faster, cheaper and more transparent than ever:  OLD WAY  ‚Ä¢ Auditing. ‚Ä¢ Preparation and coordination of legal opinions and contracts (the relationship between participants). ‚Ä¢ Signing agreements. ‚Ä¢ Sales (trade) "rights" on profits made by Airpod unit (process). ‚Ä¢ Transparency - tracking and permissions. ‚Ä¢ Cross border Payments.  VS BLOCKCHAIN  ‚Ä¢ Smart Contract and token solves all of the mentioned problems.  You can find even more simple explanation on the home page of our website: www.air-pod.io.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: Granted users are a part of the concept. But the most important part why ICO:  a) collecting funds needed to kick of the project that will be distributed like this:  61% Production and distribution 17% Marketing 15% Company operations 5% DAPP Platform development 2% Legal  As you can see the main part of budget will be used for Production of new AirPods as this drives the APOD-Crypto-Economy.  b) We see the potential of BC use wider than typical ICO. Beside implementation of our token (which is also one of the ways to rent our Airpod), the BC will be used in the development or DApp platform. Primary use of the DApp platform is general management, economic overview, and control of the individual AirPod unit(s). At the same time it is enabling complete transparency, helping us control and grow our business. More about this is written in our WP on pages: 31,32, 36, 37, 38. In addition BC enables processes on DApp platform (below) faster, cheaper and more transparent than ever:  OLD WAY  ‚Ä¢ Auditing. ‚Ä¢ Preparation and coordination of legal opinions and contracts (the relationship between participants). ‚Ä¢ Signing agreements. ‚Ä¢ Sales (trade) "rights" on profits made by Airpod unit (process). ‚Ä¢ Transparency - tracking and permissions. ‚Ä¢ Cross border Payments.  VS BLOCKCHAIN  ‚Ä¢ Smart Contract and token solves all of the mentioned problems.  This one is much more important as blockchain is essential ingredient needed for exponential growth out of airports and establishment of world-wide network in other public spaces and thus transforming travel and napping industries.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: Key features of the AirPod Sleeping Pod are:  ‚Ä¢ User friendly ‚Ä¢ Free access to Amazon Fire TV ‚Ä¢ Free High-speed Wi-Fi for all users ‚Ä¢ Sound, visual and scent relaxing / anti-stress programs ‚Ä¢ Booking via internet, IOS and Android mobile application on the spot or in advance ‚Ä¢ Easy to use - single control operating panel ‚Ä¢ Power sockets (USB/electricity) ‚Ä¢ Working desk ‚Ä¢ Luggage and personal belongings storage ‚Ä¢ Air Condition & HEPA filter (fresh air and constant temperature) ‚Ä¢ Alarm clock ‚Ä¢ Flight status information ‚Ä¢ High quality seat that can be transformed into a bed ‚Ä¢ Self-disinfection LED system.  Please check our Whitepaper pages 8-11 for deeper insight into innovations that will be included into AirPod Sleeping Pod in the nearest future.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: AirPod Sleeping Pod is a private ‚Äúcapsule style‚Äù unit designed to be installed in public spaces such as, airports, hotels, railway & bus stations, shopping centers, and offices. It is an ideal solution for people who are seeking a place to relax, sleep, work, or enjoy some privacy, while still being in a public place. AirPod is replete with cutting-edge technologies that enable users to undertake tasks in total privacy and comfort while still remaining in the heart of a public or commercial space. AirPod will contain features to enhance the user experience such as Wi-Fi, touch screen monitor, air conditioning, sound reduction technology, smart-glass privacy, mood lighting and anti-stress ambient programming.  Please check the details about the product on our website: https://air-pod.io/airpod-product/.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: For cleaning and smells will be taken for by implementing the following technology: ‚Ä¢ LED lights for disinfection that turns on after each user (detailed information). ‚Ä¢ We have integrated scent machine into Air condition which refines and perfumes the air with the procedure of cold micro-molecular dispersion. It eliminates 100% of unpleasant smells and increases the level of oxygen atoms in the air and negative ions. ‚Ä¢ The last step before next customer can use AirPod, is a physical check by our staff at the airport. I hope that answers your question, if not please let us know.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: AirPod project mostly depends on people using AirPod units to solve an issue they have in airports and other public places. Alternative payment option for AirPod renting is credit or debit card payment (it will be most probably more frequenty used as APOD in the beginning) that is why growing usage of crypto as a payment method is not a condition that has to be met for a project's success. Both fiat and crypto (APOD) payments drive Self-sustainable APOD-Crypto-Economy comparably. Do suggest you to read 43th page of the WP.

Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: Before going into mass distribution our plan is to do a commercial test. Users will be able to test AirPods in the UK airports and giving us important feedback for further improvement. After this stage is completed successfully we plan to install 100 AirPods until Q1, 2019 in the first mass distribution phase.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: Right after the ICO, we depend solely on post-ICO activity until we start placing Airpods across International Airports. Once distribution has started, our token, which is linked directly to company's revenue stream will ensure long-term stability and a potential increase in value.  Strictly technically looking, we split the received FIAT (payment for rent): using 50% for our company costs and the remaining 50% for buying Tokens on exchange at market price and placing sell orders (sell wall) of 0.023 APOD/ETH or/and 0.0002 APOD/BTC at today's equivalent value. While the number of distributed AirPods and users will grow the frequency of Tokens we buy from the Exchange grows, as a result, the value of APOD token will automatically increase over time. This simply means that more AirPods are installed and more users are generated, the frequency of Token buyback from the exchange and placing them back at a higher price, will increase with the price of APOD Token.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: Dealing with exchanges is already in process. At this point we can't disclose more.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: That is a good point. Marketing is our TOP priority activity after ICO end.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: Correct.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: Sure.  ICO contributors will be able to convert APOD tokens to a Sponsorship Program through DApp platform for each installed AirPod unit for an indefinite time period thus establishing a profit-sharing relationship (Reward), giving them the responsibility to manage unit(s) and right to collect fees in APOD Tokens.This stage is planned at (1) 400 installed AirPods; or after or (2) 1 year of business (whichever happens first). Since APOD token is transforming to a security token, we plan to act accordingly, listing it on the exchange that will support our token type.    As mentioned before, the DApp will offer APOD token holders (ICO contributors) the option of token conversion to a Sponsorship Program of the already set-up AirPods. The platform will enable contributors to make a financial analysis of the individual AirPods free of charge and help them decide which AirPod they choose. The price of a Sponsorship Program (value of a single AirPod) is adjusted in accordance with its projected financial performance - the initial price algorithm is set by us.  In case multiple parties express interest in a specific AirPod, token holders will be able to bid for the chosen AirPod. When interest is high, the cost to participate in the Sponsorship Program will rise accordingly. Tokens are the only currency used for the Sponsorship Program as well as for the reward percentage payouts. The Sponsorship Program gives contributors a chance to participate in profit shares (rewards) for the specific AirPod.  Participants in the Sponsorship program can buy a percentage (depending on the number of purchased APOD tokens), of each Sponsorship Program which can also be sold to other interested parties. Also, additional Sponsorship Program(s) can be created for a specific percentage of other AirPod unit(s). Sponsorship Program participants get their monthly reward payouts to the account they've created on the platform.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: ICO wise: APOD token is linked directly to company's revenue stream which ensures long-term stability and a potential increase in value, therefore it eliminates speculations and volatility (instability). Our ICO is one of the fewest on the market Backed by Real Product & Economy.  Business wise:  Partnerships on the production side with globally recognized companies. 10.000+ possible AirPod Locations Worldwide Global Airport Distribution Partner Revenue stream Token Profit sharing Relation in 2nd, 3rd Stage ICO contributors will have "Priority Pass" to participate in profit sharing in the 2nd phase

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: If you are referring to the speculative value of token it is impossible to predict and not something we would consider discussing. What we do know is that out of advanced economic calculations, we are able to simulate potential value on a basis of the business model and token flow. But again, it is not something we would consider to discuss publicly yet.  Strictly technically looking the basic value of token will increase because it's linked directly to company's revenue stream. Please read the explanation: We split the received FIAT (payment for rent): using 50% for our company costs and the remaining 50% for buying Tokens on exchange at market price and placing sell orders (sell wall) of 0.023 APOD/ETH or/and 0.0002 APOD/BTC at today's equivalent value. While the number of distributed AirPods and users will grow the frequency of Tokens we buy from the Exchange grows, as a result, the value of APOD token will automatically increase over time. This simply means that more AirPods are installed and more users are generated, the frequency of Token buyback from the exchange and placing them back at a higher price, will increase with the price of APOD Token.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: We will enable additional Token Models, but not calling it payout from dividends. ICO contributors will be able to convert APOD tokens to a Sponsorship Program for each installed AirPod unit for an indefinite time period thus establishing a profit-sharing relationship (Reward), giving them the responsibility to manage unit(s) and right to collect fees in APOD Tokens.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: This is a very good question. A takeover is not an option, or not something we are considering. The only possible scenario is if it is done under our terms - meaning if the potential company will be an add-on to our current business and keep the existing business model. Merger on the other side is a possible scenario, but again under our terms - if the potential partner brings in something that would have a positively affect on the project.  We are not building this project exclusively from financial aspects, our vision is to become the global leader by providing sleeping/ napping solutions. In addition, we are not here to achieve a certain international level and success and then sell the company.

Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries

Don't forget, before we use all of the money raised on ICO, we already expect revenues from Airpods that are installed.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: We see the potential of BC use wider than typical ICO. Beside implementation of our token (which is also one of the ways to rent our Airpod), the BC will be used in the development or DApp platform. Primary use of the DApp platform is general management, economic overview, and control of the individual AirPod unit(s). At the same time it is enabling complete transparency, helping us control and grow our business. More about this is written in our WP on pages: 31, 32, 36, 37, 38. In addition BC enables processes on DApp platform (below) faster, cheaper and more transparent than ever:  OLD WAY  ‚Ä¢ Auditing. ‚Ä¢ Preparation and coordination of legal opinions and contracts (the relationship between participants). ‚Ä¢ Signing agreements. ‚Ä¢ Sales (trade) "rights" on profits made by Airpod unit (process). ‚Ä¢ Transparency - tracking and permissions. ‚Ä¢ Cross border Payments.  VS BLOCKCHAIN  ‚Ä¢ Smart Contract and token solves all of the mentioned problems.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: There are two interesting points to keep in mind as potencial contributor to ICO.  The main reason for potential APOD token value increase lays in our technical execution after receiving FIAT payment for AirPod service. We split the receiving FIAT and use 50% for buying Tokens at the lowest price possible and placing them back to exchange at higher fixed price $2. While the number of AirPods and users will grow, the value of APOD token will automatically increase over time. So when more AirPods are installed and user number grows, the frequency of bought Tokens from the exchange and placing them back at a higher price, will increase the price of APOD Token.  Blockchain is essential part of our business growth. The platform is the key to our success, which will also be a marketplace where users will be able to trade Sponsorship Programs in Stage 2. The key to project success is an ecosystem, which connects all AirPods in various locations around the world with a platform that enables franchise model distribution based on the Blockchain technology (in Stage 3). For more detailed info check WP pages 36-37.  Hope this helps.

Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: AirPod, an innovative, cutting-edge sleeping pod capsule unlike any other product currently available on the Global market.  Our mission is simple: to improve the traveler‚Äôs experience by building a unit to Relax, Work, Sleep and Have fun in complete privacy while waiting in transit. We will achieve this by creating AirPod Sleeping Pod, a state-of-the-art product that meets the needs of the traveler and develop a platform for marketing those pods on different markets, starting with airports and potential use in hotels, railway & bus stations, shopping centers, offices and more, wherever people are seeking an area to relax, work or have work in privacy. Blockchain technology is essential for our business growth and strategy, that is why we are looking for community support and contribution to our business model during the Crowdsale event. We want to improve customer experience and offer travelers a balanced, comfortable and affordable space that will offer free Wi-Fi, comfort, privacy, security and relaxation. AirPod Capsule is a private ‚Äúcapsule style‚Äù designed with health, relaxation, and functionality in mind. By combining the latest technologies of special awareness, ergonomics, light, sensory, and vision we developed a comprehensive solution for transit passengers. The technology and range of services available in an AirPod fills a gap in the market for luxury services at affordable prices and offers a very similar alternative to the various already existing VIP lounges at airports. We have integrated anti-stress technology that Relaxes & Revitalizes, since stress is a major issue that our users have in common. According to scientific studies, various scents, sounds and colors stimulate cognitive recognition in the brain. That is why AirPod has integrated technology, which targets our three most important senses ‚Äì smell, vision and hearing. During a 15-minute treatment, all three senses are being monitored by the Biofeedback device (before and after effect). Our vision is to see AirPods implemented in every major airport across the globe before moving onto the smaller airports. We believe AirPod will become the ultimate unit for rest, relaxation, and privacy within airports (and later other locations).

Author: AP
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: I just finished reading whitepaper. First note I have is you did extremely good job. That statement in video makes send when you say "backed by real business". There is one thing that bothers me. In wp there is figure 1000 sleeping pods by 2021? Is that full potential of business?? Can you please explain because it seems to me that 1000 pods would fit on 50 airports. And there are a lot more airports than that. What am I missing here?  But in general I see this project as one I'm seriously interested in just need more info.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: You have a point. We are placing minimum 10 AirPods per smaller airport and minimum 30 AirPods per airport on larger airports. To answer your question why we specified 1000 AirPods by 2021. This figure is based on our own pace of expansion without 3rd phase where general public can propose new locations beside airports for AirPods. As you can see from whitepaper page 24 there are 724 international airports worldwide. We are targeting 284 airports. Keep in mind that airports are our primary market. We are placing AirPods to other public places in later phase which means additional business potential.  I hope that explains your question.

Author: AirPod_project
Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: This project is already in realization. First step was already done: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aKu--_ssP_M. Currently we are finishing the prototype. More details about it will be announced soon. Most likely during the ICO phase.

Title: [ANN][ICO] AIRPOD - Transforming the Travel and Napping industries
Body: That's a fine idea (although the title of the thread made me angry for a second, sounded so naive at first).    I see that it could be actually useful, even for people outside of crypto world. Speaking about people outside of crypto-world, what payments methods going to implemented for a nap, excluding the token of course? Have you foreseen the cabins maintenance cost? Are they going to be insured by old-fashion systems? And last but not least, what your big-data policy going to be? (please say you wont gather B.D)
